Package Description
org.drip.regression.spline
Custom Basis Spline Regression Engine

  • Uses of BasisSplineRegressor in org.drip.regression.spline

    Subclasses of BasisSplineRegressor in org.drip.regression.spline
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  HermiteBasisSplineRegressor
    HermiteBasisSplineRegressor implements the Hermite basis spline regressor for the given basis spline.
